segments.text: Good morning , I would like to make a doctor ’ s appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you describe your health concern ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been having skin problems that aren ’ t going away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Except for the rash , I feel fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would Tuesday or Wednesday be best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to come in on Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will write you in for that day at 4
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to see Dr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will write you in on that doctor ’ s schedule . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
